page.title: 05Ornithology (cont.)
page.content: initially using cars we attempted to briefly cover the whole region in three hours.We stopped when we saw habitats which invited further investigation. The date was 9 June.We began at 8 a.m. and spotted until 11 a.m. We then walked through the Gaer Fawr woods (a good site for ornithology) until 12.30 p.m. The weather was unseasonable with frequent showers.We didn't record as many species as expected,and the wood in particular was disappointing. The list of recorded species was as follows: Buzzard,Pheasant,Curlew, Woodpigeon,C.Dove,Cuckoo,G.S. Woodpecker,Skylark,Swallow,H.Martin, T.Pipit,Wren,Robin,Blackbird,S.Thrush, Whitethroat,Garden Warbler,Blackcap, Chiffchaff,Willow Warbler,Goldcrest, S.Flycatcher,Blue Tit,Great Tit,
